  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(Game game, Player player, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, boolean borrow)
      Constructor for making a reservation
      Parameters:
      game - the game that is to be reserved
      player - the player who makes the reservation
      startDate - the date of the start of the reservation
      endDate - the date of the end of the reservation
      borrow - a boolean which decides if the reservation is a borrow or not
